Avatars
=======

Avatars give your bots and users a **visual identity** during chat sessions.

Avatar Types
------------

- **None:** plain text chat only  
- **Default:** preloaded ChatLab avatar  
- **Custom:** upload your own image or generated avatar  

Generation
----------

ChatLab can automatically generate avatars from prompts (optional feature):

.. code-block:: text

   Generate a friendly cartoon researcher avatar wearing glasses.

Assigning Avatars
-----------------

Assign avatars to:
- **Bots:** represent the model or persona visually
- **Participants:** personalize their conversation window

Best Practices
--------------

- Use consistent image sizes (e.g., 128x128 px)
- Avoid photorealistic faces if participants may mistake them for real people
